decision: Start Mediterranean-style nutrition plan with reduced fried foods.
rationale: Evidence shows Mediterranean diet lowers LDL and improves HDL.

decision: Begin with 3x/week moderate cardio + 2x/week resistance training.
Introduce plant sterols and omega-3 supplements.
rationale: Plant sterols can reduce LDL by 10–15%; omega-3 improves triglycerides.

context: Wearable data showed low HRV and poor recovery during travel week.
decision: Adjust training intensity to recovery-based plan.
rationale: Recovery markers should dictate load to avoid overtraining.

decision: Increase strength training and further reduce saturated fats.
rationale: Resistance training supports lipid metabolism and HDL improvement.

context: Ashish reported plan fatigue and friction during travel.
decision: Simplify exercise plan to travel-friendly bodyweight workouts.
rationale: Adherence is more important than complexity during frequent travel.

context: Ashish’s LDL trending downward but needs further support.
decision: Add psyllium husk fiber supplement to evening routine.
rationale: Soluble fiber binds cholesterol and aids in lowering LDL.
